Edge case: cancel turning-off if hits are too sparse. Preconditions: fire is ON. Call WaterHit once to set isTurningOff=true, then do not call WaterHit again for >= maxHitInterval (2s). Expected outcome: after currentHitInterval >= 2s, Update cancels turning-off (isTurningOff=false, currentHitTime=0) and fire remains ON.
